'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Points of interest

* This is a small hut in Sātahuzi, and residence of [Mokeha](/mokeha/).

## Characters

* [Mokeha](/mokeha/), only at nighttime.
